review: Well it's very inexpensive and matches much of what my Roku 3 will do with the added benefit of apps like XBMC which very few options support.The downside is the UI is a mess. Amazon has mixed all their content in a main menu while everything else is nicely packaged into discrete apps. I know it sounds weird but it actually feels harder to use when Amazon content is jumbled like this. I wish Amazon would put their stuff in a Amazon app because right now I feel this is too confusing to gift to Mom or other less technical people. So far Roku is the better interface even if you watch Amazon content.
